en.title: Reception
paragraphs: The wedding will take place on Saturday, October 18th, 2014 at the Blue Diamond Riviera Maya.  Located at Km. 298-816, Carretera Federal 307 Chetumal-Puerto Juárez, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, 77710.  Tel: +52 (984) 877-4506.
The ceremony will begin at 16:30 and dinner will be served at 18:00.

es.title: Recepcion
paragraphs: La boda se celebrará el Sábado 18 de Octubre del 2014 en el Blue Diamond Riviera Maya.  Ubicado en Km. 298-816, Carretera Federal 307 Chetumal-Puerto Juárez, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, 77710.  Tel: +52 (984) 877-4506.
La ceremonia comenzará a las 16:30 y la cena a las 18:00.
